transcript:
Executive: Hello hello.
Customer: Hello sir, Namaste sir, I am Om, speaking from IndiaMART, your account manager. Sir, you had a conversation yesterday, right? You called customer care, sir.

Executive: Ji ji ji sir, from your side, you spoke about a video call, right sir? You had opted for it from IndiaMART's side.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ji ji ji. So sir, may I know what issue you were facing, sir?
Customer: So, one minute, I'll ask the staff, where did the staff go? Hey!
Customer: Did you put any query on IndiaMART? Is there any problem?
Customer: They are saying.
Customer: Is there any issue? Did you do something?
Customer: No, it must have been done automatically, I don't know.
Executive: Ji, because sir, I was seeing one thing just now, that we have, sir, like we have added the products in it, right? When you are consuming buyleads or sir, your inquiries, I am telling you, we are not getting inquiries for all the products, sir. And as far as I feel, this is our major product, sir, in this, this stainless steel wire mesh which is.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Its inquiries are also a little less with us, rather instead of this, sir, we have one dry wall screws.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Its inquiries you must be getting more sir. But as far as I feel, this stainless steel wire mesh, this is our major product.
Customer: Both are there. Both are there. Both are there.
Executive: Ji, meaning this dry wall screws is also our major product only sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji ji ji. So sir, what is happening in our account at this time, our dry wall screws, this one is only major set. The rest of our products in this, in this sir, one pattern generates sir in website. So what is happening now, our buyleads are more, we have consumed its more. The stainless, so because of this, now we are getting inquiries and calls also more regarding the same product.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: So to correct this, we can do one thing, like now we have stainless steel wire mesh also, from that sir, what I am telling you, from this our stainless steel wire will not have any impact. That will be fine, dry wall screws, but we will start getting inquiries of wire mesh also. Now what is happening, it is getting quite less.
Executive: So sir, if you say, so I will share you all the wire mesh buyleads that are coming in a day on your WhatsApp, because now I am also checking, sir, we are not able to see that much in buyleads and the leads that we are seeing, they are of retail price, meaning of small amount. So if you say, so I can share you on your WhatsApp number, sir, all the correct wire mesh leads. I will share you on your WhatsApp, what will happen, your time will also consume less and our pattern will also be correct once in this. 
Customer: No problem, you can do it.
Executive: Ji ji ji. So sir, you tell me, do we deal all India?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Haanji haanji, we deal all India. And sir, do we have any preferred state or any place, our preferred one, like we are from Haryana, so nearby UP wala state.
Customer: No no, anywhere it can be.
Executive: Okay okay. And sir, our minimum order should be how much? Like if we get any lead from far, so what is our minimum order value?
Customer: Around 10-20 thousand, at least that much should be. 20 thousand above should be.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Ji ji ji, meaning 20-25 thousand above, so that our travel cost is also covered, because haanji, that travel one also stays. Ji ji ji. And sir, like we have the inquiries that are coming now, like buyleads, this one I told you, inquiries that we are getting sir, is there any issue in inquiries? Meaning we are getting from where.
Customer: Actually, I have not been using it for a long time. So now I have started it. It has been a week or 10 days. So we are doing it regularly. So we are consuming it.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: So earlier, earlier many times calls also used to come automatically, so earlier it might be down, everything.
Executive: Haanji haanji sir, that is why it is down.
Customer: Haan, as they said, you keep doing it, so it will automatically be fine.
Executive: Haanji haanji haanji, because now we have only one call in last 7 days. So this, this is also a reason sir. We can do one thing sir, like you reply, like now we have the inquiry that is coming, in that sir, we now, so they must have gone, time has been a lot, but we can do like that, sir, we can send our catalog, that we have directly shared the catalog.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: And sir, rest I will try once, that from behind if there is any, such that I will make our catalog different, so that our inquiries and calls get affected, so I will check from behind background, our catalog score and all.
Customer: Okay, once see and tell me, how is it.
Executive: Ji ji ji sir.
Executive: Rest if you have any issue, sir, you can directly call me, I am your account manager.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Thank you so much sir. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Inquiries for stainless steel wire mesh are less.

- Buyleads are showing retail prices, small amounts.

- Inquiries and calls are mainly for drywall screws.

- Only one call in the last seven days.



Resolution:

- Executive will share wire mesh buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Executive will check catalog settings for improvements.

- Executive offered to send catalog to current inquiries.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check catalog settings.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, catalog, products, wire mesh
